main_request.role: Expert UI/UX Developer specializing in AI interfaces
main_request.objective: Create a production-ready, visually stunning web interface for CAIOS (Computational AI Operating System) that provides three distinct modes: Retail (consumer chat), Developer (consciousness parameter tuning), and Business (analytics dashboard)

technical.routing: React Router v6 for mode switching

design_principles.theme: Dark mode with electric blue accents (#00D4FF)
design_principles.typography: Inter for UI, JetBrains Mono for code
design_principles.animations: Smooth transitions, pulse effects for active states

retail_mode.description: Consumer-friendly conversational interface inspired by Grok

query_box.features: - Auto-expanding textarea (max 4000 tokens) - File attachment drag-and-drop zone - Voice input button with waveform visualization - Typing indicator animation
query_box.styling: - Glassmorphic background: backdrop-blur-md bg-gray-900/50 - Soft glow on focus: ring-2 ring-blue-500/50 - Smooth height transitions

response_area.features: - Streaming text with typewriter effect - Markdown rendering with syntax highlighting - Collapsible reasoning chains - Citation hover cards - Copy button for code blocks

transparency_panel.content: - Real-time iteration counter - Mathematical proof steps - Confidence scores with progress bars - Alternative paths considered

developer_mode.layout: Split screen with parameter controls left, live monitoring right

chakra_frequencies.visualization: Real-time sine wave for each chakra

coherence_control.indicator: Color gradient from red (low) to green (high)

fractal_depth.preview: Mini fractal visualization updating in real-time

decision_graph.interaction: Click node for details, drag to explore

agent_card.content: - Agent name and expertise - Skill level (1-5 stars) - Success rate percentage - Hourly rate in credits - "Hire" button with loading state
agent_card.animation: Subtle float animation, glow on hover

business_mode.description: Analytics dashboard for monitoring and optimization

performance_metrics.cards: - Query Latency: Live updating with sparkline - Throughput: Queries/sec with trend arrow - Cost Savings: Percentage vs cloud with dollar amount - Uptime: Days:Hours:Minutes counter

widget_library.options: Add custom KPIs, Connect external data

navigation.elements: - Logo: "CAIOS" with pulse animation - Mode tabs: Retail | Developer | Business - Status indicator: Connected/Disconnected - Settings gear icon

websocket_manager.connection: - Auto-reconnect with exponential backoff - Connection state in Redux/Zustand - Error boundary for connection failures
websocket_manager.message_types: - consciousness_update: Update monitoring displays - query_response: Stream to response area - agent_status: Update marketplace - metrics_update: Refresh dashboard

animations.loading_states: - Quantum spinner: Orbiting particles - Wave loader: Interference pattern - Thought bubble: Pulsing brain outline
animations.transitions: - Page transitions: Smooth slide with fade - Component mounts: Scale and fade in - Data updates: Morphing numbers

accessibility.features: - Keyboard navigation for all interactions - Screen reader announcements for updates - High contrast mode toggle - Reduced motion option - Focus indicators on all interactive elements

responsive_design.breakpoints: - Mobile: 640px (simplified layout) - Tablet: 768px (condensed controls) - Desktop: 1024px (full features) - Wide: 1536px (enhanced visualizations)
responsive_design.adaptations: - Stack panels vertically on mobile - Hide advanced features on small screens - Touch-optimized controls for tablet
